item.title: PySpark Basics: Data Manipulation
item.author: wilajeni
item.description: Explore common PySpark syntax for data manipulation, and compare it to SQL and dplyr in R.

item.title: Intro to GLM: Calculating Pure Premium with SAS
item.author: wilajeni
item.description: Using a dataset with only four variables as an example to fit a GLM and calculate pure car insurance premiums.

item.title: Intro to GLM: Modeling in R and SAS
item.author: wilajeni
item.description: A comparison of the proc genmod in SAS and the glm() function in R for building GLM models.

item.title: Irish Beginner: An Corp
item.author: wilajeni
item.description: Learning Irish from Gaeltacht UCD. Anoad 10 of textbook A1 is about body.

item.title: Plotting with R: ggplot2 vs baseR
item.author: wilajeni
item.description: Comparing the different approaches to creating similar types of plots using ggplot2 and baseR.

item.description: Learning Irish from Gaeltacht UCD. Anoad 9 of textbook A1 is about family.

item.title: R for Life Assurances

item.description: Composing R functions to calculate EPVs of common life products.
